item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Trump threatens to invoke Insurrection Act
item.description: The ICE agent who shot Renee Good suffered internal bleeding, multiple U.S. officials familiar with his medical condition told ABC News.

item.title: 17 college basketball players charged in point-shaving scheme: Indictment
item.description: Basketball players are charged in a point shaving scheme to fix games in the NCAA and Chinese Basketball Association and rig bets.

item.title: WATCH: Taking marriage proposals to new heights
item.description: One guy went to incredible heights to get the job done, proposing on a rope bridge 1,000 feet in the air in Vietnam.

item.title: Sick astronaut, rest of crew splash down in Pacific after undocking from ISS
item.description: Crew-11 splashed down off the coast of San Diego, California, early on Thursday.

item.title: WATCH: David Muir shares heartwarming moment brother kisses newborn sister for first time
item.description: Colorado mom Shelby Wold, captured the moment her two-year-old kissed his newborn sister for the first time, but she never expected the reaction her d...
